name: express-your-love
description: A playful, heartfelt web app designed to help you express your feelings in a fun and memorable way. This project creates an interactive experience where the recipient is gently (and humorously) encouraged to accept your invitation, with delightful UI touches and a charming, personalized message.

scripts.build: parcel build index.html && npx purgecss --css dist/*.css --content dist/*.html dist/*.js --output dist/
